text: it would be great if there was the ability to bulk delete rows in hubDB

Marketing and Sales always work together and the ofter need same data but in a different way, marketers need aggregated data and sales need data and aggregate data. It would be great if reports can work without contacts and deal permissions.

I would post this in the ideas forum, I think itâ€™d likely get some votes.

In the short term some work-arounds - you could use the HubDB API to update the HubDB programmatically. You could also just export the HubDB as a CSV delete the rows and upload.
